scripts.build-browserify: browserify src/joi-browser.js -s Joi -t babelify | derequire | ntee dist/bundle.js | uglifyjs - -c warnings=false -m | ntee dist/bundle.min.js | ngzip > dist/bundle.min.js.gz
scripts.build-webpack: webpack && uglifyjs dist/webpack-bundle.js -c warnings=false -m | ntee dist/webpack-bundle.min.js | ngzip > dist/webpack-bundle.min.js.gz
scripts.postinstall: viralify . -t babelify -t aliasify -f -p joi -p hoek -p topo -p isemail
